process_improvements: Reflection system now supports non-interactive mode

technical_learnings: Synchronized Orchestrator script with documentation regarding Beads issue blockers
Added phase-specific mandatory checks to protocol compliance engine
Implemented HSL-style color coding for informational vs error status in CLI
challenges_overcome: Identified and resolved discrepancy between SOP written policy and automated enforcement script
protocol_issues: Initial SOP was ambiguous about exactly when a Beads issue becomes mandatory
process_improvements: Added explicit Beads issue requirement as a step in the Planning phase documentation to prevent downstream implementation blockers

technical_learnings: /next workflow is at ~/.gemini/antigravity/global_workflows/next.md, not in show-next-task skill
SOP Phase I = Session Context (initialization-briefing), Phase II = Task Discovery (bd ready)
challenges_overcome: Initially modified wrong file (show-next-task skill instead of next.md workflow)
Reverted unnecessary changes to keep implementation clean
protocol_issues: /wtu workflow was too vague - just said 'wrap it up' without specific phase invocations
process_improvements: Both /next and /wtu workflows now explicitly reference specific scripts and compliance checks
Workflows now align with SOP phases 1-2 for /next and phases 5-7 for /wtu

technical_learnings: GEMINI.md is injected as user rules - can add // turbo commands for auto-execution
SOP has 7 phases: Session Context, Init, Planning, Execution, Finalization, Retrospective, Clean State
challenges_overcome: Initially modified wrong file (show-next-task instead of next.md workflow)
Had to make SOP enforcement automatic rather than rely on agent memory
protocol_issues: /next workflow was skipping Phase I (Session Context)
/wtu workflow was too vague without specific phase commands
SOP wasn't being followed when user didn't explicitly invoke /next
process_improvements: /next now runs Phase I (initialization-briefing) before Phase II (bd ready)
/wtu now explicitly invokes Phases 5-7 with specific commands
GEMINI.md now auto-executes init checks at session start (// turbo)
Orchestrator SKILL.md has mandatory session start section
